bad_request.name: bad_request
bad_request.description:
Bad Request Error Response-Synchronous:
-2 - INVALID/MISSING PARAMETER,
-3 - THE AMOUNT DEBITED OR CREDITED MUST BE GREATER THAT 0/POSITIVE INTEGER,
-5 - DEBIT AND CREDIT(S) AMOUNTS NOT BALANCING,
-6 - TRANSACTION AMOUNT LESS/GREATER THAN MINIMUM/MAXIMUM LIMIT ALLOWED,
-11 - MESSAGE REFERENCE/REFERENCE NUMBER LONGER THAN ALLOWED LENGTH,
-12 - DUPLICATE REFERENCE/IDENTICAL REFERENCE AND MESSAGEREFERENCE

conflict.description:

-1 - DUPLICATE MESSAGE REFERENCE

-16 - DAILY LIMIT EXHAUSTED
